trans-unit.source: Defines methods for obtaining and releasing an existing handle to a Windows device context.
trans-unit.target: Define os métodos para obter e libertar um identificador existente para um contexto de dispositivo do Windows.

trans-unit.source: A device context defines the graphics object for drawing on a Windows-based device.
trans-unit.target: Um contexto do dispositivo define o objeto de gráfico para desenhar num dispositivo com Windows.

trans-unit.source: An example of a class that implements the IDeviceContext interface is the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: Um exemplo de uma classe que implementa a interface IDeviceContext é a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>classe.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Returns the handle to a Windows device context.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o identificador a um contexto de dispositivo do Windows.

trans-unit.source: GetHdc and <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A> are two methods that allow you to get and release the handle for a Windows-based device.
trans-unit.target: GetHdc e <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A>dois métodos que lhe permitem obter e libertar o identificador de um dispositivo com Windows.</xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A>

trans-unit.source: You should always follow a call to GetHdc with a call to <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A> when you are finished with the Windows handle.
trans-unit.target: Deve seguir sempre uma chamada para GetHdc com uma chamada para <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A>Quando tiver terminado com o identificador do Windows.</xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A>

trans-unit.source: GetHdc is not designed to obtain handles created using Windows GDI methods such as `CreateDC` or `CreateCompatibleDC`.
trans-unit.target: GetHdc não foi concebido para obter os identificadores criados utilizando métodos de Windows GDI como `CreateDC` ou `CreateCompatibleDC`.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IntPtr> representing the handle of a device context.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IntPtr>que representa o identificador de um contexto de dispositivo.</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: Releases the handle of a Windows device context.
trans-unit.target: Liberta o identificador de um contexto de dispositivo do Windows.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A> and ReleaseHdc are two methods that allow you to get and release the handle for a Windows-based device.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A>e ReleaseHdc dois métodos que lhe permitem obter e libertar o identificador de um dispositivo com Windows.</xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A>

trans-unit.source: You should always follow a call to <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A> with a call to ReleaseHdc when you are finished with the Windows handle.
trans-unit.target: Deve seguir sempre uma chamada para <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A>com uma chamada para ReleaseHdc quando tiver terminado com o identificador do Windows.</xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A>
